items.title: Show HN: Narev – Open-Source FinOps for AI and Cloud Spend
items.summary: Narev is an open-source FinOps tool that unifies SaaS billing data from cloud providers like AWS, Azure, GCP, and OpenAI, using FOCUS 1.2 from the FinOps Foundation. It ingests billing data, normalizes it, and provides a single dashboard for users to manage their AI and cloud spend.
